hotels.title: Stylish Japanese Escape at the Gateway to Hokkaido
hotels.description: Discover the legendary powder of Hokkaido, the unrivalled golf courses of Chitose and the spectacular Shikotsu-Toya National Park from the glittering ANA Crowne Plaza Chitose, an IHG Hotel. Lavishly appointed, this elegant property effortlessly blends Japanese style with modern conveniences. When not in your accommodation, two onsite restaurants serve up mouthwatering dishes, offering everything from traditional Japanese meals to Western favourites.
